title: Siddhi Deployment Tutorials
description: This course contains series of tutorials about deploying Siddhi on Kubernetes

courses.title: Stateless Siddhi App
courses.description: Deploy a stateless Siddhi Application on Kubernetes.

courses.title: Stateful Siddhi App
courses.description: Deploy a stateful Siddhi Application on Kubernetes.

courses.title: Distributed stateful Siddhi App
courses.description: Deploy a stateful Siddhi Application in distributed mode on Kubernetes while automatically configuring NATS.

courses.title: Distributed stateful Siddhi App with existing NATS
courses.description: Deploy a stateful Siddhi Application in distributed mode on Kubernetes with preconfigured NATS.
